closeOnClickModal.description: Whether it supports clicking on the mask layer to close, and the action passed in by clicking the mask callback is 'modal'
closeOnClickModal.description_zh: 是否支持点击蒙层进行关闭，点击蒙层回调传入的 action 为'modal'

inputType.description: When type is prompt, enter the type of box
inputType.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框类型

inputValue.description: When type is prompt, enter the initial value of the box
inputValue.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框初始值

inputPlaceholder.description: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框 placeholder
inputPlaceholder.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框 placeholder

inputPattern.description: When the type is prompt, the input box is checked for regularity, and the verification is performed when you click the OK button
inputPattern.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框正则校验，点击确定按钮时进行校验

inputValidate.description: When the type is prompt, enter the box to verify the function, and click the OK button to verify it
inputValidate.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框校验函数，点击确定按钮时进行校验

inputError.description: When the type is prompt, the error message when the input box fails to pass the verification
inputError.description_zh: 当 type 为 prompt 时，输入框检验不通过时的错误提示文案

lazyRender.description: The content of the elastic layer is lazy to render, and the content is only rendered when the display is triggered
lazyRender.description_zh: 弹层内容懒渲染，触发展示时才渲染内容
